args.name: romName
args.description: the name of the file (without extension) in the roms folder

args.name: saveName
args.description: the name of the file (without extension) in the saves folder. by default uses last autosave.

commands.name: !downscale
commands.description: Toggle downscaling of the rendered image

args.name: amount
args.description: When no number is provided, toggles downscaling. Otherwise, can downscale by 2, 4, or 8x.

commands.name: !pause
commands.description: Toggle rendering, does not pause emulator

commands.name: !snap
commands.description: Toggle color palette snapping. Uses server palette as of plugin load time

commands.name: !setbutton
commands.description: Set a button to be located where the clipboard selection is located

args.name: button
args.description: the button to assign (one of a, b, l, r, up, down, left, right, select, start)

commands.name: !setscreen
commands.description: Set the screen located where the clipboard selection is located (48x32 brick)

args.name: saveName
args.description: The name of the save (used in !gba romName saveName)
